alert.note: Alert for Mineral; Missoula (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 4:14PM MDT until August 29 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL MINERAL AND SOUTHWESTERN MISSOULA COUNTIES... At 413 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tarkio to 12 miles west of Lolo, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Alberton, Tarkio, Wye, Riverbend, Ninemile, Lozeau, Huson, Quartz, Cyr, and Stark. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
